      • enableSrcCodeActionBts

        public void enableSrcCodeActionBts(boolean isCompile,
                                   boolean isRun)
        Enables or disables the buttons for actions to compile and run a project. The booleans indicate if the respective button is set enabled or disabled
        Parameters:
        isCompile - the boolean
        isRun - the boolean

      • enableChangeProjBt

        public void enableChangeProjBt(boolean b)
        Enables or disables the button for changing project actions
        Parameters:
        b - true to enable, false to disable the button

      • enableCutCopyBts

        public void enableCutCopyBts(boolean b)
        Enables or disables the buttons for cutting and copying actions
        Parameters:
        b - true to enable, false to disable both buttons

      • enableUndoRedoBts

        public void enableUndoRedoBts(boolean isUndo,
                              boolean isRedo)
        Enables or disables the buttons for undoing and redoing actions. The booleans indicate if the respective button is set enabled or disabled
        Parameters:
        isUndo - the boolean
        isRedo - the boolean
